description: You won't miss the minced meat in this satisfying bowl of veggie bean chilli.
keywords: Chilli,Pescatarian,Eggplant,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Smokey Eggplant & Kidney Bean Chilli Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium eggplants, sliced into thick cubes
0.5 tsp chilli powder, or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a large, deep pan, heat the oil and add the eggplant cube and diced onion. Cook over a medium high heat for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until caramelised and soft, in two batches if necessary.
Add the spices and fry for a further two minutes, stirring to coat the eggplant and onions.
Add the kidney beans with the liquid from the cans and chopped tomatoes, stir then pour over the vegetable stock.
Bring to the boil then reduce the heat to low, put a lid on the pan and allow to simmer for 45 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent the bottom of the pan from burning.
Remove the lid and cook for a further ten minutes, until the sauce has thickened and serve.
